name: Dream'N'Rhythm
description:
Help a girl dream peacefully by playing a rhythm game imposed by her subconscious while she is asleep.

Play a rhythm game while you're on the ground and a platformer when you're upside down! Hit the notes, avoid spikes and be careful of the gravity inverting itself!

Play a One Button Rhythm Game full of colors and fluidity!

Try to beat your best score, improve your reactivity skills, improve your rhythm skills, try to make a full combo but most importantly:

 Have fun!

⇉ This game was made for a school assignment. It could still be improved in the future if there are enough demands.
